Analyze how individual landscapes in Fonville et al. 2014 change over time.

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
source('strain_panel_analysis_funs.R')
source('../../Ha_Nam/R/analysis_functions.R')
options(dplyr.summarise.inform = FALSE)
filter <- dplyr::filter
```

```{r}
hanam = import_full_HaNam_data()
```

```{r}
## For each individual, and sample year, get width, max_titer, and steepness
hanam %>%
  group_by(subject, sample_year, test_strain_year) %>% filter(!is.na(logtiter)) %>%
  summarise(`frac>=40` = sum(titer>=40)/n(),
            `frac_detectable` = sum(titer>5)/n(),
            max_logtiter = max(logtiter)) %>%
  summarise(nW40 = sum(`frac>=40`)/n(),
            nW0 = sum(frac_detectable)/n(),
            max_logtiter = max(max_logtiter),
            steepness = max_logtiter/(2*sum(frac_detectable))) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_line(aes(x = sample_year, y = nW0, group = subject), alpha = .3)
```
